James Freeman

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: J. M. Moore
  3. Location of Family: Primrose, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Albion, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 12
  7. Date of Birth: 1895
  8. Gender: male
  9. Notes: Sibling sent to same family.
  10. Source: Albion Argus (NE), 23 March 1907.
